name: X (Formerly Twitter) Tool
semantic_context: Post, like, and search tweets, send messages, search users, and add users to lists
natural_language_description: 这是 X (Formerly Twitter) Tool 节点。主要用于: Post, like, and search tweets, send messages, search users, and add users to lists

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.default: Post, like, and search tweets, send messages, search users, and add users to lists
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Post, like, and search tweets, send messages, search users, and add users to lists | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: tweet
available_options: Direct Message (值: directMessage) - Send a direct message to a user
List (值: list) - Add a user to a list
Tweet (值: tweet) - Create, like, search, or delete a tweet
User (值: user) - Search users by username

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: searchUser
available_options: Get (值: searchUser) - Retrieve a user by username

user.name: user
user.description: The user you want to search
user.natural_language_description: 参数名: User | 作用: The user you want to search | 默认值: {'mode': 'username', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

text.name: text
text.description: The text of the status update. URLs must be encoded. Links wrapped with the t.co shortener will affect character count
text.natural_language_description: 参数名: Text | 作用: The text of the status update. URLs must be encoded. Links wrapped with the t.co shortener will affect character count | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: sortOrder (值: None) - The order in which to return results
startTime (值: None) - Tweets before this date will not be returned. This date must be within the last 7 days if you don't have Academic Research access.
endTime (值: None) - Tweets after this date will not be returned. This date must be within the last 7 days if you don't have Academic Research access.
tweetFieldsObject (值: None) - The fields to add to each returned tweet object. Default fields are: ID, text, edit_history_tweet_ids.

list.name: list
list.description: The list you want to add the user to
list.natural_language_description: 参数名: List | 作用: The list you want to add the user to | 默认值: {'mode': 'id', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

noticeLocation.displayName: Locations are not supported due to Twitter V2 API limitations
noticeLocation.name: noticeLocation
noticeLocation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Locations are not supported due to Twitter V2 API limitations

noticeAttachments.displayName: Attachements are not supported due to Twitter V2 API limitations
noticeAttachments.name: noticeAttachments
noticeAttachments.natural_language_description: 参数名: Attachements are not supported due to Twitter V2 API limitations

tweetDeleteId.name: tweetDeleteId
tweetDeleteId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tweet | 作用: The tweet to delete | 默认值: {'mode': 'id', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

tweetId.name: tweetId
tweetId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tweet | 作用: The tweet to retweet | 默认值: {'mode': 'id', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

searchText.name: searchText
searchText.description: A UTF-8, URL-encoded search query of 500 characters maximum, including operators. Queries may additionally be limited by complexity. Check the searching examples here.
searchText.natural_language_description: 参数名: Search Term | 作用: A UTF-8, URL-encoded search query of 500 characters maximum, including operators. Queries may additionally be limited by complexity. Check the searching examples here. | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

me.name: me
me.description: Whether you want to search the authenticated user
me.natural_language_description: 参数名: Me | 作用: Whether you want to search the authenticated user | 默认值: False
